"To redirect an end user to a particular page after the record producer is submitted, define the redirect link in the Script field"

questions.question_text: Application developers can specify which ServiceNow page a user sees after submitting a new record using the Record Producer UI. How is the page specified?

choices.A: Create an application property to store the URL
choices.C: Write an after Business Rule script for the Record Producer's table: window.redirect = "<URL>";
choices.B: Configure the page in the Module that opens the Record Producer UI
choices.D: Write a script in the Record Producer's Script field: producer.redirect = "<URL>";
You can script behaviors of fields in the user interface.
choices.E: Graphics can be included on the user interface.
choices.A: All records created using this strategy are inserted into the Requested Item [sc_req_item] table.
choices.B: Each field prompts the user with a question rather than a field label.
